Name: Survive Now
About the game: Survive Now is a top-down stylized survival game with roguelite elements. Each level lasts for 40 minutes, and while surviving until the end may seem easy, but no one can complete any level in a single try Supports mouse, keyboard, controller. Features & Quick tips Dozens of skill available to learn and upgrade Collect energy to learn new skills and upgrade exising skills Maximum 7 weapon skill you can use at once
